title: COVID-19 in South Africa
description: This article mainly discusses the COVID-19 situation and affection to South Africa in 2021 (until Aug 29, 2021).

title: Hi, this is Yunqi Chen's blog
description:
Hi there! Welcome to my blog of ETC5523 Blog Assignment at Monash University. 

The first post is about the COVID-19 situation in South Africa. 

I hope you can enjoy my blog!
